hero.title: ESM Replenishment
hero.subtitle: Automated Stock Replenishment and Demand-Driven Supply Management
hero.description: Digitalize your replenishment process to ensure the right product, at the right time, in the right place.ESM Replenishment analyzes sales, inventory and demand data to determine optimal stock levels and automatically generate purchase recommendations.With a data-driven decision engine, it eliminates stockouts and overstocks while maximizing operational efficiency.

benefits: Automates replenishment and stock management workflows.
Reduces excess inventory costs and prevents stockouts.
Generates intelligent purchase recommendations based on demand data.
Seamlessly integrates with ERP, WMS and supplier systems.
Improves operational efficiency and minimizes human error.

features.title: Automated Stock Replenishment

features.title: Demand Analysis and Forecasting
features.description: AI-driven models analyze sales velocity, market trends and seasonal demand.Helps businesses act proactively against fluctuations.

features.title: Integration and Data Synchronization
features.description: Integrates with ERP, inventory and sales systems for end-to-end visibility.Ensures data accuracy and eliminates manual input processes.

features.title: Performance Monitoring and Reporting
features.description: Tracks inventory turnover, sales performance and supplier efficiency.Provides actionable insights for data-driven strategic decisions.
